name: RECLORE. [demo]
description:
Inspired by UNDERTALE by Toby Fox

Click or tap the letters to enter a name (there ARE Easter eggs!)

Z or tap/click to continue in diolouge.

When you click the heart thingy, when the beeps are the fastest, click/tap.

Click/tap the arrow at the end to continue.

This game was made in scratch

Have fun!!!
